description: Fixed Excel integration: Added missing endpoints and improved credential storage
changes: Fixed Excel function integration - added missing /api/seeq/credentials, /api/seeq/search-sensors, /api/seeq/sensor-data endpoints
Replaced global credential storage with Flask session-based storage for better security
Added automatic credential storage from taskpane authentication for Excel functions
Added structured logging for production monitoring
Fixed authentication flow between taskpane and Excel functions
Excel functions now work properly with SEEQ_SEARCH_SENSORS and SEEQ_SENSOR_DATA
